channel.title: nullPointerException in Ultimate PK WILL REP FOR HELP!
channel.description:
Hello. I am creating a new server based on Ultimate PK, but a very strange thing happens whenever the server fails to find the connection vertex. Instead of disconnecting like it should, it throws a nullPointerException and causes the server to crash. I have tried multiple ways of making the offending client disconnect before it causes the error, but somehow it still manages to wreak havok before I can get rid of it. This is the only error still happening on my server. If I had it fixed it would run 24/7. Also note that this only happens when the server has max players... Any ideas?
Edit: Even stranger, it is always the client with slot 0 that the failure to find the connection vertex occurs to...
Edit 2: According to Xerocheez's comments, slot 0 is not handeled properly with the client. I looked at the code to prevent slot 0 being used, but it is intact. Why the heck is slot 0 being used??
Edit 3: Also after the nullpointerexception I get a lot of errors from player.postprocessing...[br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 07:07:41 PM[/size][hr]I'm desperate! Someone help, anyone??

item.description:
@yppman wrote:

Hello. I am creating a new server based on Ultimate PK, but a very strange thing happens whenever the server fails to find the connection vertex. Instead of disconnecting like it should, it throws a nullPointerException and causes the server to crash. I have tried multiple ways of making the offending client disconnect before it causes the error, but somehow it still manages to wreak havok before I can get rid of it. This is the only error still happening on my server. If I had it fixed it would run 24/7. Also note that this only happens when the server has max players… Any ideas?

Edit: Even stranger, it is always the client with slot 0 that the failure to find the connection vertex occurs to…

Edit 2: According to Xerocheez’s comments, slot 0 is not handeled properly with the client. I looked at the code to prevent slot 0 being used, but it is intact. Why the heck is slot 0 being used??

Edit 3: Also after the nullpointerexception I get a lot of errors from player.postprocessing…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 07:07:41 PM[/size][hr]I’m desperate! Someone help, anyone??
